name: Garrett Cobb
text: Please support this shop as it is the only one we have around here. The owner Brian is very knowledgeable as he was one of the old school skaters. I'm 41 and this shop brings back alot of memories from when I started skating. #supportyourlocalskateshop

name: Cedric Lee
text: If you keep going, he starts to know what stuff you want, next time you go, he ends up having it.

name: Phillip Allen
text: 10 stars!! I have been going to Brian's skate shop since I was 10 years old. He is always super nice and easy to talk to. If you have questions about your skateboard, he is the guy to go to. ALWAYS GREAT PRICES AND GREAT QUALITY EQUIPMENT!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

name: William Hernández
text: Pretty cool skateshop! Super friendly service. Definitely recommend it!

name: Antonio Lucero
text: Good selection of decks and hardware. Helpful and awesome customer service. Worth driving to from Montgomery area. Got a deck and some grip tape for a good price and Brian slapped the tape on for me.

name: Trevor Popravak
text: Awesome skate store ☠💀☠

name: Kristin Nicole Terstriep
text: My husband and I went in today to get him a board, and it was a great experience. Brian was so helpful and just seemed like a really good guy.  He has a good selection, and is very knowledgeable. We will definitely be back and I would recommend this place 100%

name: Shane Corbin
text: Great owner, shares his love of the sport with customers. Great prices too

name: Jim J
text: Brian has your skateboard needs covered. He has the presence of a mythical creature who never ages. His skateboard knowledge is one of true mastery. Thanks again for providing premium service!

name: Katelyn Viskup
text: Very knowledgeable in skateboarding. Great vibe. Various brands and styles to choose from. Brain is awesome!

name: Sarah Millard
text: Great skateshop with a skate slab to do some tricks. Brian is a very friendly and knowledgeable person who also goes the extra mile to help skaters with their tricks. The shop offers all of your skateboard needs. He also sells snacks/candies, drinks, apparel, and accessories.

name: Joshua Clark
text: Its awesome man, not to professional everyones cool as hell and laid back. Brian is a dope dude helps skaters out when they dont know how to do a trick. If your looking for a little place to go to skate... This is a great spot especially for beginners. Great place to hangout.

name: David Boatwright
text: Great skate shop with a good selection to fill all of your skate needs

name: JaNae Thomas
text: Small but homey. He had everything we needed and was very knowledgeable and helpful. I will be going back there.

name: Duke “the Dwarf” Lancaster
text: a friend recommended me to Brians skate shop I talked to him for an hour or so about skating him haveing an answer for every question I had and I had alot because I'm new to skateboarding I wasn't .Originaly planning to buy a board  just to figure out if I did want one but I figured I did want to and he sat there and made me a board for a good price 10/10 would go there again

name: Robert Birge
text: Great place to get a skateboard and great prices he took time with my son and helping design the perfect skateboard and then he showed him a few tricks will visit again for sure

name: Luke Flanders
text: Wow great shop Brian is extremely knowlegable and offers the best service!

name: Joseph Halford
text: He is a real cool guy will help you with all your skating needs

name: Alex Williams
text: Best skate shop around! Love being here, I wouldn't buy skate gear from anyone else.

name: Jennifer Briggs
text: Helped me pick out a board for my daughter. Wonderful service

name: Ethan Grabowski
text: Great and safe place for people looking to skate. Shop sells snacks if you get hungry, and has two ramps set up for tricks.

name: Naoki The Wicker
text: Epic shop cool owner chill place to buy anything for your board.

name: Todd Buckelew
text: Great place! Great owner!

name: Colton Zeth
text: Best skate shop ever.

name: Cheyenne Morrison
text: Raddest shop owner in the Wiregrass.

name: Chris Carnley
text: Great ppl

name: Deborah Trammell
text: Very professional. Respected by all

name: Addison&brianna inspire
text: Best one near me
